form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Registration for Classification as Conditional Entrant, United States Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service, Form 1-590 (, Form 1-590

full_text: Form Approved REGISTRATION Budget Bureau No. 43-R0408 FOR CLASSIFICATION AS CONDITIONAL ENTRANT UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Section 203(a)(7) IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALY File No. Immigration and Nationality Act PM 12 A20 866 872 RECEIVED REGISTRANT TO FURNISH THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION (READ INSTRUCTIONS ON REVERSE) TYPE OR PRINT 1. My name is: First Middle Last Leib TOMCHINSKY 2. My present address is: Lungomare Duca degli Abruzzi 50/5, Ostia, Rome, Italy 3. I was born on: (month)(day) (year) Place of birth (city or town) (Province) (Country) My present nationality is: Apr.4,1906 Odessa USSR ex USSR 4. Height Weight Eyes Hair Complexion Marks or Scars 5'1 130 Brown grey fair none 5. I fled or was displaced from (Name of country) On or about (month) (day) (year) USSR July 5 1977 6. Reasons: (State in detail) I left the Soviet Union because of the strong antisemitism that exists. For my remaining few years I would like to work and live in a democratic country. Italy 7. My present immigration status in is: transit (Country in which residing) The evidence of my immigration status in the country in which I am residing is: (Describe) USSR exit visa N.010925/26 issued in Odessa , 14 June 1977 valid for exit until 6 July 1977. 8. My spouse's name is: 9. (His) (Her) present address is: 10. Spouse's nationality is: Basya TOMACHINSKY same as mine ex USSR 11. My spouse will will not accompany me to the United States 12. Name of child (ren) Date of birth Place of birth Present address TOMCHINSKY Aleksandr 7May/39 Odessa, USSR Zaslavskovo 29/16, Odessa, USSR BATSIORNICK Clara 1Jun./37 Odessa ,USSR Gen. Patrova str. 36/9, Odessa Place a mark (X) in front of name of each child who will accompany you to the United States 13. Schooling or Education Name and location Title of Degree Type Dates attended of school or Diploma Jewish School Odessa prim. 1916-18 unfinished 14. Military Service Branch and Country Dates Serial No. Rank Attained Organization none Form I-590 (REV. 5-15-68)
